title: HUGE 2BR___ELEVATOR ____$2595___LAUNDRY ___BAY RIDGE SHORE ROAD
posting_body: ['Newly listed!', 'SPONSOR UNIT.', 'No board approval!', 'Lovely, NEWLY RENOVATED two bedroom Co-op apartment with spacious layout, roomy closets, good natural light , dining area, new kitchen , wood flooring.', 'Stainless steel appliances with dishwasher.', 'Located on a quiet tree lined street in Bay Ridge.', 'Heating and Hot Water included.', 'Washing Machines in Basement.', 'Bike room available(one time $60 key fee) and additional storage (wait list).', 'NO DOGS ALLOWED.', 'Cats ok with $375 non refundable fee.', 'PARKING SPOT AVAILABLE.', 'Live in the heart of Bay Ridge in a well maintained elevator building.', 'Half block from Shore Road to express bus to NYC, near bike path, tennis courts and parks.', 'Quiet tree lined block.', 'A ten minute walk to R train and 3rd Avenue for great restaurants and shopping.', 'Heat and hot water included.', 'No dogs allowed.', 'PARKING SPOTS AVAILABLE for new perspective tenants- “based on a waiting list”- indoor parking garage is $250.', 'This amount is paid directly to the CO-OP and not included in the rent.', 'Call or Text Daniel at 347-429-2213 to view today.']
